body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, postmaster. Kentucky native. Son of Bradley Meredith and Gemima Meredith. Married Eliza Carrol Meredith in Edmonson County, Kentucky on September 2, 1856. Postmaster in Edmonson County, Kentucky in 1850. Appointed United States Postmaster in Bee Spring, Edmonson County, Kentucky on September 10, 1862. Enrolled for military duty in Second District of Kentucky on July 1, 1863 (U.S.A).
